There is also Poseidon (see <http://www.gentleware.com/>), a commercial
product based on ArgoUML; you can download a 15-day free trial version.  In
my (admittedly limited) experience, it works much better than ArgoUML.

Kendall

From: "Jason Rogers" <jacaetevha@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, October 11, 2002 12:04
Subject: RE: [junit] Junit Design Patterns.


> Just as an FYI -- I have never had a good experience with this one...
> Neither has anyone whom I know that has used it.  Probably "user error."
> :)
>
> =jason
> [:question | ^One]

>   http://argouml.tigris.org
>
> it's not as polished as Together, but it is Free and free ;-)
> They have other nice things too, BTW.
>
